xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.3 Abyākatapada » 2.5.3.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
89.
1442Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
90.
1443Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
